**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 356 4.0 **Traditions** [Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Deities** [Bastet](/Deities.aspx?ID=50), [Daikitsu](/Deities.aspx?ID=174), [Grandmother Spider](/Deities.aspx?ID=37) **Patron Theme** [Mosquito Witch ](/Patrons.aspx?ID=10) **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Duration** 10 minutes --- You transform into the battle form of a Tiny animal, such as a cat, insect, lizard, or rat. You can decide the specific type of animal (such as a rat or praying mantis), but this has no effect on the form's Size or statistics. While in this form, you gain the [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) trait, and you can't make Strikes. You can Dismiss the spell. You gain the following statistics and abilities:
  • AC = 15 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • Speed 20 feet.
  • Weakness 5 to physical damage. (If you take physical damage in this form, you take 5 additional damage.)
  • [Low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416) and imprecise [scent](/Rules.aspx?ID=417) 30 feet.
  • [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) and [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) modifiers of +10, unless your own modifier is higher; [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) modifier –4.
--- **Heightened (4th)** You can turn into a flying creature, such as a bird, which grants you a fly Speed of 20 feet.
name: Pest Form
